en.bdb: The enemy-king Ravana fell in great fury on lakshman and went towards him with wind speed and great ire

en.bdb: He inflicted a wound on the heart of Lakshman and in this way wreaking vengeance on him for the killing of his son, he cused the fall of Lakshman.562.

ss.gurmukhi: (ijs krky l`Cmx) GumyrI Kw ky DrqI 'qy if`g ipAw hY। mwno (rwvx ny) pu`qr dw bdlw lY ilAw hovy ]562]
